text:
Proclamation under the Conveyancing Act 2004

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Conveyancing Act 2004 fix 1 September 2005 as the day on which that Act commences.

22 August 2005

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JUDY JACKSON

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 31 August 2005

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
